name: design-by-contract
description: apply 'design by contract' methodology to your javascript code

scripts.build:browser: browserify -s designByContract src/index.ts -p [ tsify ] > dist/design-by-contract.js && terser --compress --mangle -o dist/design-by-contract.min.js dist/design-by-contract.js
